This does say men's sweater, but I am a woman, and love it. It is such a beautiful color, the picture really doesn't do it much justice at all. The material is so soft and cozy, and it keeps the warmth in nicely. It washes well, and when dried on a low heat I don't think that there has been any shrinkage. It feels very high quality, and there hasn't been any pilling or shedding like there often is with the pseudo-wool type material. I love this sweater and I am heavily considering snagging it in other colors.

I have never been a wearer of sweaters, jackets or long sleeve shirts my entire life. Growing up in PA I have always been immune to all but the most extreme cold. However, after reaching my 50s my tolerance for the cold has gone down hill quite a bit. I can still tolerate colder temperatures than most of now they do start taking a toll on me. I bought this sweater to weather under my jacket when it is below freezing and it is very warm and comfortable. Excellent quality and very nice looking as well!
This sweater is a very nice weight and the color is a perfect match to the photo.
Great soft sweater. Size fits true. Neck hole is a bit tight if you have thick neck might need to size up.

This is a really thick sweater. While I prefer something more breathable, I wear it on its own just fine even though I am quick to sweat. It isn't so much a "sweat-er" but is definitely on the warmer side. That comes down to preference though. Also, I can use this instead of layering and it still has holes for a bit more breathability.  The sweatshirt looks really nice. It has a nice homely vibe. Looks great and warm and true to size

The Men’s Vintage Grandpa Aesthetic Sweater in purple is a bold and stylish piece perfect for Y2K grunge or Korean streetwear enthusiasts. Its vibrant color and vintage-inspired knit design blend nostalgic charm with modern fashion trends. The crewneck style and oversized fit provide both comfort and versatility, making it ideal for layering during cooler weather. This sweater pairs effortlessly with baggy jeans, cargo pants, or even layered over a shirt for a textured look. Durable and well-made, it’s a great choice for anyone looking to stand out with a unique, retro-meets-contemporary aesthetic. Ensure to buy an extra size for an oversized look.

This sweater is oversized and nice and thick. The neutral color works great in my wardrobe and has a lot of room to layer in!
